description: Buys when the 20-day SMA crosses above the 50-day SMA and sells when it crosses below.
Buys when the 10-day EMA crosses above the 30-day EMA and sells when it crosses below.
Buys when the 15-day WMA crosses above the 30-day WMA and sells when it crosses below.
Buys when the 10-day DEMA crosses above the 20-day DEMA and sells when it crosses below.
Buys when the 10-day TEMA crosses above the 20-day TEMA and sells when it crosses below.
Buys when the 10-day SMMA crosses above the 30-day SMMA and sells when it crosses below.
Buys when price crosses above the HMA and sells when it crosses below.
Buys when the 10-day ZLEMA crosses above the 30-day ZLEMA and sells when it crosses below.
Buys if RSI < 40 and sells when RSI rises above 60.
Buys when MACD crosses above the signal line and sells when it crosses below.
Buys when %K crosses above %D and sells when %K crosses below %D.
Buys when Momentum > 0 and sells when Momentum turns negative.
Buys when ROC rises above zero and sells when it drops below zero.
Buys when TRIX crosses above zero and sells when it crosses below zero.
Buys when CCI is below -100 and sells when CCI goes above 100.
Buys when the Ultimate Oscillator is below 40 and sells when it rises above 60.
Buys when the Awesome Oscillator crosses above zero and sells when it crosses below.
Buys when PPO crosses above its signal line and sells when it crosses below.
Buys when ATR is rising and momentum is positive. Sells when momentum turns negative.
Buys when price crosses above the lower Bollinger Band and sells when it crosses below the upper Bollinger Band.
Buys when close crosses above the lower Bollinger Band and sells when it crosses below the upper Bollinger Band.
Buys when ADX is above 25 and +DI crosses above -DI. Sells when -DI crosses above +DI.
Buys when ADXR is above 20 and +DI crosses above -DI. Sells when +DI crosses below -DI.
Buys when PLUS_DI crosses above MINUS_DI and sells when it crosses below.
Buys when MINUS_DI crosses below PLUS_DI and sells when it crosses above.
Buys when price crosses above the Parabolic SAR and sells when it crosses below.
Buys when Aroon Up crosses above Aroon Down and sells when Aroon Down crosses above Aroon Up.
Buys when Aroon Oscillator crosses above zero and sells when it crosses below zero.
Buys when Heikin Ashi close is greater than current price and sells when it is lower.
Buys when price crosses above Senkou A and sells when it crosses below Senkou B.
Buys when the 20-day SMA crosses above the 50-day SMA and sells when it crosses below.
Buys when the 10-day EMA crosses above the 30-day EMA and sells when it crosses below.
Buys when the 15-day WMA crosses above the 30-day WMA and sells when it crosses below.
Buys when the 10-day DEMA crosses above the 20-day DEMA and sells when it crosses below.

Buys when the 10-day SMMA crosses above the 30-day SMMA and sells when it crosses below.
Buys when price crosses above the HMA and sells when price crosses below the HMA.
Buys when the 10-day ZLEMA crosses above the 30-day ZLEMA and sells when it crosses below.
Buys when RSI is below 40 and sells when RSI rises above 60.
Buys when MACD crosses above the signal line and sells when it crosses below.
Buys when %K crosses above %D and sells when %K crosses below %D.
Buys when momentum is greater than 0 and sells when it turns negative.
Buys when ROC rises above zero and sells when it drops below zero.
Buys when TRIX crosses above zero and sells when it crosses below zero.
Buys when CCI < -100 and sells when CCI > 100.
Buys when the Ultimate Oscillator is below 40 and sells when it rises above 60.
Buys when Awesome Oscillator crosses above zero and sells when it crosses below.
Buys when PPO crosses above its signal line and sells when it crosses below.
Buys when ATR is rising and momentum is positive. Sells when momentum turns negative.
Buys when the price is below the lower Bollinger Band and sells when it rises above the upper band.
Buys when the close price is below the lower Bollinger Band and sells when it rises above the upper Bollinger Band.
Buys when ADX > 25 and +DI crosses above -DI. Sells when -DI crosses above +DI.
Buys when ADXR is above 20 and +DI crosses above -DI. Sells when +DI crosses below -DI.
Buys when PLUS_DI crosses above MINUS_DI and sells when it crosses below.
Buys when MINUS_DI crosses below PLUS_DI and sells when it crosses above.
Buys when price crosses above the Parabolic SAR and sells when it crosses below.
Buys when Aroon Up crosses above Aroon Down and sells when Aroon Down crosses above Aroon Up.
Buys when the Aroon Oscillator crosses above zero and sells when it crosses below.
Buys when Heikin Ashi close is greater than the current price and sells when it is lower.
Buys when price crosses above Senkou A and sells when it crosses below Senkou B.
This criteria targets stocks exhibiting strong momentum.
